task_description:
# Create Analytics Dashboard

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-61](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-61/create-analytics-dashboard)
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

Charts, date selector, KPIs - Ref: 11-analytics.png

patterns.page_structure: Pages use functional components with TypeScript, useState/useEffect hooks, Material-UI components, loading/error states with Skeleton components, responsive design with MUI Box/Grid
patterns.api_service: API services use apiClient from './client' with environment variable VITE_API_URL, export object with async methods returning typed responses, handle errors in calling component
patterns.material_ui: Consistent use of MUI components with theme.spacing(), sx prop for styling, responsive breakpoints in Grid (xs, sm, md, lg), Box for layout containers
patterns.routing: Routes added to App.tsx inside ProtectedRoute and Layout wrappers, use <Route path='...' element={<Component />} /> pattern
patterns.kpi_display: KPICard component exists in components/ui/Card.tsx with props: title, value, trend, trendLabel, icon, loading, color

existing_implementations.description: Found comprehensive dashboard page pattern in DashboardPage.tsx with KPI cards, loading states, error handling, and responsive grid layout. API service pattern established with axios client in api/client.ts. KPICard component already exists for metric display.
